p: GaCl 3–TPP was prepared in a N 2-filled glovebox, by addition of 1.125 mL (4.281 mmol) TPP to an equimolar amount (0.7538 g) of GaCl 3, followed by heating to 50 °C under constant stirring. After a few minutes, an opaque, white, crystalline solid formed, which was dissolved in 10 mL of toluene at 100 °C.
